Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2013 02:18AM sharon28 wrote: I was diagnosed on June 6 and also have a husband who wasn't being supportive.  I was feeling terribly alone and afraid and ordered the book Breast Cancer Husband to give him, not sure how he'd react. I think the book really helped him. Not being a talker, he didn't say much about it except that it had some unexpected humor that surprised him, which he appreciated. My sister who lives on the other coast has been very supportive and a friend who lives close by.  I guess we have to find out who we can lean on and who isn't afraid.
Posts.Title: Waiting for biopsy...Married, but feeling alone. Grace1969 Grace1969
